doctor_utters: How may I help you today?
Do you have shortness of breath?
Do you have chest pain or tightness?
Do you have a productive cough with yellow or green sputum?
Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke, dust, or pollen?
Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
Do you have any other symptoms such as fatigue, chills, or body aches?
Have you been in contact with anyone who has traveled to an area with a high risk of infectious diseases?
patient_utters: Yes, I have been coughing up blood and I am currently using intravenous drugs. I also have diabetes and I take corticosteroids.
Yes, I am infected with the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
